# EmojiAPI
Simple Emoji API.

# Installing

```sh
$ npm i emoji-api
```

# Example

```js
const { EmojiAPI } = require("emoji-api");
const emoji = new EmojiAPI();

emoji.get("ðŸ˜‚")
    .then(emoji => {
        console.log(emoji);
    })
```
